# [Interview #1040: Steelheart Signing Report - Mysty, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1040#1)

#### Question

Is the Nightwatcher Cultivation or of Cultivation somehow?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That is strongly hinted in the book.
